comments.author: sarithsutha
comments.body:
Removed the extra spaces.

And here is the clarification on UTF7 usage:
This test is for the scenario when SeekPositionForTail fails when using a FileSystemContentReaderWriter. FileSystemContentReaderWriter treats UTF7 and UTF8 differently when determining the starting byte. The exception BackReaderEncodingNotSupportedException is not thrown for UTF8.
